textBeforeTable: Track Listing This is bright and fun New Orleans Jazz at it's loosest and liveliest. Great swing playing that doesn't take itself too seriously. This dates back to the mid 70s but the overall sound and vibe is fresh and upbeat . There's some nice solos from the trombonist and trumpeter ("Dream A Little Dream"), decent Louis A. style vocals and some offbeat and accomplished percussion top off a few tracks.  12/02/2012 Amoeba Review SHIPS FREE in U.S. Currently Unavailable The Bourbon Street Irregulars Let's Fly Down (LP) Tweet Let's Fly Down (LP) Home The Bourbon Street Irregulars Let's Fly Down (LP) DJ Spooky That Subliminal Kid Anodyne
